title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 503.1 - Purpose and application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 503.1 - Purpose and application

State Regulations
(a) The
purpose of this Part is to supplement the provisions of the State Environmental

Quality Review Act and the rules and regulations of the Department of

Environmental Conservation promulgated thereunder, by providing a supplemental
list of Type II actions specifically related to the particular activities of
the New York State Energy Research and Development Authority. (b) This Part shall apply to any action that
the New York State Energy Research and Development Authority intends to carry
out, fund, or approve. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
503.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
